板.definition: board; plank; plate; shutter; table tennis bat; clappers (music); CL:塊|块[kuai4]; accented beat in Chinese music; hard; stiff; to stop smiling or look serious

板上釘釘.definition: that clinches it; that's final; no two ways about it

板凳.definition: wooden bench or stool; CL:張|张[zhang1],條|条[tiao2]

板報.definition: see 黑板報|黑板报[hei1 ban3 bao4]

板塊.definition: slab; (geology) tectonic plate; (fig.) sector (of the stock market or of industry); (economic) bloc

板子.definition: board; plank; bamboo or birch for corporal punishment

板式塔.definition: distillation tower; bubble tower; plate column

板房.definition: temporary housing built with wooden planks or other makeshift materials

板書.definition: to write on the blackboard; writing on the blackboard

板橋.definition: Banqiao or Panchiao city in Taiwan

板橋市.definition: Banqiao or Panchiao city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan

板溝.definition: chalkboard ledge; whiteboard ledge; chalk tray (at the foot of a blackboard); whiteboard marker tray

板牙.definition: incisor; molar; screw die; threading die

板眼.definition: measure in traditional Chinese music; orderliness

板築.definition: variant of 版築|版筑[ban3 zhu4]

板胡.definition: a bowed stringed instrument with a thin wooden soundboard

板臉.definition: to put on a straight, stern or blank face; to put on a poker face

板藍根.definition: indigo woad root; root of Isatis tinctoria (used in TCM)

板門店.definition: Panmunjeom, the Joint Security Area in the Korean demilitarized zone

板門店停戰村.pinyin: Ban3 men2 dian4 ting2 zhan4 cun1
板門店停戰村.definition: Panmunjom village on the DMZ between North and South Korea

板麵.definition: pan mee, aka banmian, a Hakka noodle soup dish, popular in Malaysia
